Page 1 of 4      J O B R E SP O NSI B I L I T IE S :
 1.Ensure that the product or service meets client's required criteria
 2.Create and follow goals to achieve high standards
3.Ensure product or service is legally compliant
4.Responsibility for Quality control activities
5.Carry out day by day inspection of in process activities
6.Responsible for calibration activities and necessary follow up
7.Maintains all records related to the inspection and testing activities at all stages
8.Responsible to implement all corrective and preventive action
9.Conducting Rejection Analysis meeting and interaction with suppliers concerning any quality  
10.problems at supplier end ordinate with all external assessors
11.Preparing Work Instruction for all the activities inside the organization
12.Monitor or observe operations to ensure that they meet production standards
13.Recommend adjustments to the process or assembly
14.Inspect, test, or measure materials or products being produced
15.Measure products with rulers, calipers, gauges, or micrometers
16.Accept or reject finished items
17.Remove all products and materials that fail to meet specifications
18.Discuss inspection results with those responsible for products
19.Report inspection and test data

11.Develope recommend and monitor corrective and preventive actions
12.Prepare reports to communicate out comes of quality activities
13.Identify training needs and organize training interventions to meet quality std
